snippet: Rafael Nadal struggled to finish off Fabio Fognini at the Barcelona Open on Friday but eventually quelled one of his most troublesome opponents 6-2 7-6(1) to reach the semi-finals....
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal struggled to finish off Fabio Fognini at the Barcelona Open on Friday but eventually quelled one of his most troublesome opponents 6-2 7-6(1) to reach the semi-finals.

headline.print_headline: Nadal Sees Off Troublesome Fognini in Barcelona
headline.main: Nadal Sees Off Troublesome Fognini in Barcelona
